item.title: Alfred North Whitehead
item.dc:creator: Edward Hillenaar
item.description: Alfred North Whitehead post with references to biblio.bib.

item.title: Cities with Best (and Worst) Weather, 2021 edition
item.dc:creator: Taras Kaduk
item.description: An analysis of NCEI GSOD weather data with a subsequent ranking of World and U.S. cities in terms pleasant weather. Count of pleasant days and calculation of excess degree-days are used as two different approaches, returning similar (yet not identical) results.

item.title: Print Personalized Street Maps Using R
item.dc:creator: Taras Kaduk
item.description: A code walk-through of how to generate streets maps in R using {osmdata} and {sf} packages. Initially published on 2019-12-19 and updated on 2020-01-18.

item.title: Analysis of Kyiv Road Traffic Using Uber Movement Data
item.dc:creator: Taras Kaduk
item.description: This analysis uses Uber Movement speed data to analyze traffic of Kyiv, Ukraine. By looking at the speed data, we are able to find traffic flow's bottlenecks, as well as see the impact of COVID-19-related measures on the city traffic

item.title: Measuring Excess Degree-Days in the Context of Location Comfort and Liveability
item.dc:creator: Taras Kaduk
item.description: Calcualting deviations (excess heat and excess cold) from an established temperature baseline as area under the temperature curve via integral calculus and expressing such measure as Excess Degree-Days, or EDD.

item.title: Is Rock Dying?
item.dc:creator: Taras Kaduk
item.description: A quantitative comparison of artists in the Billboard 200 charts 1963 - 2018. A comparison of rock and hip-hop artists show a decline of the former and the rise of the latter

item.title: Analyze and visualize your iPhone's Health app data in R
item.dc:creator: Taras Kaduk
item.description: Learn to import, analyze and visualize your Health app data in R

item.title: Where are the places with the best (and the worst) weather in the United States?
item.dc:creator: Taras Kaduk
item.description: Using NOAA GSOD data in determining the amount of pleasant days in USA's core-based statistical areas

item.title: Power Query: Excel's gateway to reproducible analysis
item.dc:creator: Taras Kaduk
item.description: Review of Power Query's scripting language as a way to evangelize reproducible data analysis and programming with minimal learning investment

item.title: Create World Pixel Maps in R
item.dc:creator: Taras Kaduk
item.description: A walk-through of generating personalized pixel maps with R from scratch.

item.title: Do MPAA movie ratings mean anything?
item.dc:creator: Taras Kaduk
item.description: Investigating the movie ratings and and their content. With R.
